histogram.name: DeprecatedInvalidatorRegistrar.CrashStatus
histogram.summary: DeprecatedInvlalidatorRegistrar is crashing on the browser shut down. The reason for the crash is that not all invalidation handlers de-registister themselves. Histogram records the type of the handler which hasn't unregistered itself. Analyzing the histogram will allow us to understand, which handlers are causing the crash.

histogram.name: FCMInvalidations.FailedSubscriptionsErrorCode
histogram.summary: Net error codes for failed subscription requests.

histogram.name: FCMInvalidations.FCMMessageStatus{FCMInvalidationSenders}
histogram.summary: Status of the message from the FCM channel. Recorded upon receiving response from the FCM channel. {FCMInvalidationSenders}

variant.name: .Drive
variant.summary: The message was sent with the Drive sender ID

variant.name: .Policy
variant.summary: The message was sent with the Policy sender ID

variant.name: .Sync
variant.summary: The message was sent with the Sync sender ID

histogram.name: FCMInvalidations.InitialTokenRetrievalStatus
histogram.summary: Status of the initial attempt to retrieve the instance id token.

histogram.name: FCMInvalidations.ResetClientIDStatus
histogram.summary: Status of resetting the client instance ID, which includes unregistering from FCM servers.

histogram.name: FCMInvalidations.SubscriptionRequestStatus
histogram.summary: Status of subscription request to the Per User Topic server. Recorded upon receiving response from server.

histogram.name: FCMInvalidations.SubscriptionResponseCode
histogram.summary: For each subcription request to the FCM Per-User-Topic server, log the response received from the server.

histogram.name: FCMInvalidations.SubscriptionResponseCodeForTopic{FCMInvalidationNonSyncPerUserTopics}
histogram.summary: For each subcription request to the FCM Per-User-Topic server, log the response received from the server per topic. Note: This is only recorded with a data type suffix. The base version is never recorded. {FCMInvalidationNonSyncPerUserTopics}

histogram.name: FCMInvalidations.TokenStateOnRegistrationRequest2
histogram.summary: Records the outcome of instance ID token requests (i.e. whether the token changed). Such requests are made when invalidations are first enabled (e.g. on sign-in), and then periodically every 24 hours.

histogram.name: FCMInvalidations.UnsubscriptionRequestStatus
histogram.summary: Status of unsubscription request to the Per User Topic server. Recorded upon receiving response from server.

histogram.name: Invalidations.GCMUpstreamRequest
histogram.summary: Status of sending outgoing invalidation message through GCM upsteam.

histogram.name: Invalidations.StatusChanged
histogram.summary: Status of the invalidation component. The metric is recorded on startup unless invalidations are disabled, plus when the state changes.
